title: SparkCluster
description: Spark cluster with Zeppelin Notebook editor
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.1 with Tensorflow and Keras enabled.

title: SparkCluster with Bokeh
description: Spark cluster with Zeppelin Notebook editor having Bokeh support
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.1 with Tensorflow and Keras enabled. To use Bokeh in Zeppelin Notebooks, just add import bkzep and output_notebook(notebook_type='zeppelin')
